sources.title: 1941 Hochzeitsnacht ( Heli Finkenzeller, Geraldine Katt, Hans Fidesser)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1941. Hochzeitsnacht.  U.a mit Geraldine Katt und Heli Finkenzeller

metadata.Plot: Vroni defies her dad: she won't marry miller Balduin but her true love Franz. The father insists, but friend Kleefass helps and steals all marriage certificates of the town - resulting in sudden lawlessness and a chaotic night of ...
metadata.Writer: Richard Billinger, Werner Eplinius, O.C.A. Zur Nedden
metadata.Actors: Heli Finkenzeller, Geraldine Katt, Hans Fidesser
